definitions.definition: A drug (trademark Xanax ) of the benzodiazepine group (8- chloro- 1- methyl -6- phenyl -4 H -[1,2,4] triazolo [4,3- a ][1,4]benzodiazepine), used in the treatment of anxiety .

main_definition: ( pharmacology ) A drug (trademark Xanax ) of the benzodiazepine group (8- chloro- 1- methyl -6- phenyl -4 H -[1,2,4] triazolo [4,3- a ][1,4]benzodiazepine), used in the treatment of anxiety .
